mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments(post_id, answer_id, author_id, anonymous, content) VALUES (#{postId}, #{answerId}, #{authorId}, #{anonymous}, #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT c.id id, c.post_id post_id, c.answer_id answer_id, c.author_id author_id, u.profile_image author_profile_image, u.nickname author_nickname, c.anonymous anonymous, c.content content, c.created_at created_at, c.deleted_at deleted_at FROM comments c JOIN users u ON c.author_id = u.id WHERE c.id = #{commentId};
